Execute.Statement: GetSpecificationValues(FormatType, Value, ESerie, PowerRating, MaxAmp, Tolerance, Footprint, PartNumberModel, InternalPartNumber, ComponentKind)

Result:= Format('%*s%*s%*s%-*s%*s%*s%-*s%-*s%-*s', ColumnManager.GetColumnWidth(ColumnOffset + TZenerDiodeSpecColumns.Value, 1), Value, ColumnManager.GetColumnWidth(ColumnOffset + TZenerDiodeSpecColumns.ESerie, 1), ESerie, ColumnManager.GetColumnWidth(ColumnOffset + TZenerDiodeSpecColumns.PowerRating, 1), PowerRating, ColumnManager.GetColumnWidth(ColumnOffset + TZenerDiodeSpecColumns.MaxAmp, 1), MaxAmp, ColumnManager.GetColumnWidth(ColumnOffset + TZenerDiodeSpecColumns.Tolerance, 1), Tolerance, ColumnManager.GetColumnWidth(ColumnOffset + TZenerDiodeSpecColumns.None1, 1), '', ColumnManager.GetColumnWidth(ColumnOffset + TZenerDiodeSpecColumns.FootPrint, 1), Footprint, ColumnManager.GetColumnWidth(ColumnOffset + TZenerDiodeSpecColumns.PartNumberModel, 1), PartNumberModel, ColumnManager.GetColumnWidth(ColumnOffset + TZenerDiodeSpecColumns.InternalPartNumber, 1), InternalPartNumber)
Result:= ConcatExt(' ', True, Value, Tolerance, PowerRating, Footprint, PartNumberModel, InternalPartNumber, ComponentKind)
